body:
Comment 3 by **antonio.diaz.gil**: 
I use "appengine/mail" to send mail, it hasn't any function to process received mails.
Then I'd tried to parse the mails with "mime" & "mime/multipart". 

I received incoming mails as HTTP-POST from AppEngine. I've printed the mail bytes and
there are only '\n' chars as line separators.
